## crawler

```{r}
library(rvest)
html <- read_html("https://www.imdb.com/search/title?groups=top_250&sort=user_rating&page=1&ref_=adv_nxt")
nods <- html_nodes(html, ".lister-item-header")
Movies <- html_text(nods)
df <- data.frame(Movies)

```

## Show Results

```{r Table}
library(knitr)
kable(df)
```
